name: wxchat
description: 微信文件传输助手Web应用 - 模块化设计

scripts.db:init-all: npm run db:init && npm run db:init-admin
scripts.db:reset: wrangler d1 execute wxchat --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin_logs; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS daily_stats; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sessions; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS messages; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS files; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS devices;" && npm run db:init-all
scripts.pages:dev: npm run build:pages && wrangler pages dev ./public --compatibility-date=2025-06-17 --d1=DB=wxchat --r2=R2=wxchat
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build:pages && wrangler pages deploy ./public --project-name=wxchat-pages --compatibility-date=2025-06-17

author: flalad
